column4: once installed, does wine need to be executed or does it automatically run in the background
you have to launch win32 programs (.exe) with wine <exe>
there's no wine.exe. you open a terminal, cd to the directory where iexplore.exe is and do $ wine iexplore.exe
it just means you have to do that command. ignore it and just write "wine iexplore.exe" without the quotes
